name: Interactive Study Groups
description: Connect with peers and form study groups for interactive learning and collaborative study sessions.

name: Real-time Collaboration
description: Study together in real-time with group video chats, document sharing, and chat functionality.

name: Resource Sharing
description: Share and access study materials, notes, and resources within your study groups.access study materials, notes

name: Progress Tracking
description: Monitor your group's progress, set goals, and track study achievements for each member.

name: Accessibility and Mobile Support
description: Study on-the-go with mobile support and ensure easy access for all users.
